description: Fired when a business user begins the onboarding flow (tour dismissed, step 1 shown)
Fired each time the user advances a step during business onboarding; includes step number and trade category
Fired when AI generates profile options from the chat conversation; includes number of messages exchanged
Fired on successful completion of business onboarding (API submit + Clerk metadata updated); includes trade_category and suburb
Fired when a business clicks 'Unlock Details' for a lead; includes lead_id and unlock_fee_cents
Fired when a lead is successfully unlocked (either from wallet or payment); includes lead_id and payment_method (wallet or stripe)
Fired when a business marks themselves as 'on the way' to a lead's job; includes lead_id
Fired when a job is confirmed via PIN; includes lead_id
Fired when a business successfully creates a campaign; includes campaign_type and bonus_amount_cents or multiplier
Fired when a business pauses or reactivates a campaign; includes campaign_id and new state (paused/active)
Fired when a business deletes a campaign; includes campaign_id
Fired when a referrer shares a referral link via any channel; includes channel (sms, whatsapp, facebook, twitter, instagram, email, native_share) and business_slug
Fired when a referrer copies a pre-written referral message; includes channel (sms, whatsapp, email) and business_slug
Fired when a referrer shows the QR code for in-person referrals; includes business_slug
Fired when a referrer completes onboarding; includes region selected
Fired when a business owner sends a message in the AI onboarding chat; includes message count
Server-side: Fired when the AI generate-profile API is called; includes whether it was a tweak or fresh generation
